tasks.title: Design Checkpoint State Management System

tasks.title: Define Checkpoint Event Flow Architecture
tasks.description: Create detailed event flow diagrams showing: checkpoint triggers, state capture process, validation steps, storage operations, recovery procedures, and rollback mechanisms

tasks.title: Design Checkpoint System Components
tasks.description: Define specific components: CheckpointManager, StateSerializer, StorageAdapter, RecoveryHandler, ValidationEngine, and their interfaces and responsibilities

tasks.title: Create Checkpoint Architecture Diagram
tasks.description: Create visual architecture diagram using Mermaid or similar tool showing all components, data flows, and integration points

tasks.title: Define Checkpoint API Specification
